items.sentence: Tom brushed his teeth and put on his pajamas.
Tom called Mary every bad name under the sun.
We\'re doing things we\'ve never done before.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know Mary.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t like Mary.
Tom wanted me to help Mary with her homework.
Tom wanted save up enough money to buy a car.
Tom wanted to buy a new pair of tennis shoes.
Tom wanted to get married after he graduated.
Do you find that washing machine easy to use?
Do you happen to have any photographs of Tom?
Do you have a flashlight that I could borrow?
Do you have any idea who could be doing this?
I just don\'t want there to be any bloodshed.
I just thought that you wouldn\'t want to go.
I just want Tom to know that we\'ll miss him.
You shouldn\'t judge others on how they look.
Did Tom say how long Mary would be in Boston?
Tom has probably already forgotten about you.
Tom has published many papers on the subject.
